title: I Want to Teach You
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Um... Is it like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Awesome, awesome! You’ve got the new step down perfectly, Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Phew... I’m glad. But this step seems tough. We could easily get out of sync if we don’t listen to the beat carefully.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’s why we should practice together, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, you’re right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>...If we’re supposed to practice together, why did you say you wanted to be the first to practice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Huh? That’s because... I thought I could teach Honoka and Kotori...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh, hogging them all to yourself?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>No, that’s not it! Rin, you’re the best at dancing, and you’re always looking after everyone. I’m just helping out!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sounds suspicious, nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s not suspicious! Come on, Rin...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
